channel.title: Team Maya on Portfolio Project
channel.description: Recent content in Team Maya on Portfolio Project

item.title: Theme Changes
item.description: We modified the Bilburry theme to better accommodate our project, the theme itself doesn’t have the buttons on the main tab, we implemented them using HTML and SASS to make the types of post we create more organized, we also changed the options from standard languages ​​that are English and German to Portuguese (standard) and English. When the English option is clicked, the site loads an English version of the posts.
